boardgame.description: Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Allies celebrates 25 years of strategy war gaming with a deluxe edition of its original theater-level game. Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Allies Pacific 1940, designed and developed by Larry Harris, utilizes the updated rules established in A_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp;A Anniversary Edition. Two new combat units debut in this game, Tactical Bombers and Mechanized Infantry. Australia and New Zealand, joined together as the ANZAC forces, represent a new playable ally. China fields more forces than ever before, but will need help from their allies -- the United States and England -- to withstand the might of expansionist Imperial Japan._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Allies Pacific 1940 features an oversized board that measures 35 inches wide by 32 inches high (89 x 81 cm). With over 450 pieces, deluxe game components and local storage boxes, this game raises the standard established by A_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp;A Anniversary Edition. All new rules for neutral nations, naval _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; air bases, kamikaze attacks and convoy disruption add even more depth and historical accuracy to this giant game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Finally, this deluxe theater-level game is designed to join together with Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies Europe 1940 to create the greatest Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Allies experience to date! When joined, these boards will measure 5 feet wide by 32 inches high (178 x 81 cm). Both games have been designed to play alone or together to offer a 2-6 player global 1940 scenario, complete with separate set up and national objectives._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Integrates with:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies Europe 1940_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: AXIS _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; ALLIES DICE! Add an Edge to your Game with these Field Marshal Games EXCLUSIVE COMBAT DICE. Highest quality and Custom crafted with the Military insignia of each major combatant Nation of the Second World War. The Perfect Edition to your Favorite Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies Strategy War Game. Each National Set includes 6 Dice each! Complete set includes 6 UK Dice, 6 Germany Dice, 6 USA Dice, 6 USSR Dice and 6 Japan Dice, CHINA 6 Dice, ITALY 6 Dice... A total of 42 DICE!!!

Avalon Hill (WOC 217450000) Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies celebrates 25 years of strategy war gaming with a deluxe edition of its original theater-level game. Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies Pacific 1940, designed and developed by Larry Harris, utilizes the updated rules established in A_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;A Anniversary Edition. Two new combat units debut in this game, Tactical Bombers and Mechanized Infantry. Australia and New Zealand, joined together as the ANZAC forces, represent a new playable ally. China fields more forces than ever before, but will need help from their allies -- the United States and England -- to withstand the might of expansionist Imperial Japan. Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies Pacific 1940 features an oversized board that measures 35 inches wide by 32 inches high. With over 450 pieces, deluxe game components and local storage boxes, this game raises the standard established by A_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;A Anniversary Edition. All new rules for neutral nations, naval _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; air bases, kamikaze attacks and convoy disruption add even more depth and historical accuracy to this giant game. Finally, this deluxe theater-level game is designed to join together with Axis and Allies Europe: 1940 Edition to create the greatest Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies experience to date! When joined, these boards will measure 5 feet wide by 32 inches high. Both games have been designed to play alone or together to offer a 2-6 player global 1940 scenario, complete with separate set up and national objectives.

This game is BRAND NEW and SEALED. I bought it from CoolStuffInc.com and it came with a V shaped (factory?) slit on the shrink wrap. It is a perfect 1.5 inch V shaped slit, that is why I assume it is from the factory. I am selling this for _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;so cheap_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; because I bought 2 copies when it was released and realized that I was a bit over zealous with my spending. I am just trying to make my money back. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a great game that comes with a very large board and many game pieces. S_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;H will probably cost between $10 and $15 depending where you live. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a heavy box. Obviously, I will determine the exact S_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;H for you when the time comes. Thank you. -adam.

Wizards of the Coast (WOCA06260000) 2nd Edition A World War II strategy game. Its the Empire of Japan against the Allied powers of the United States, Soviet Union, and United Kingdom. You control the Japanese forces or one of the Allied powers. You command your country_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s military forces and its war time economy. Japan will try to dominate half of the world as it builds its forces and maneuvers its fleet in the Pacific region. As one of the Allied powers you must cooperate with the other Allied powers to make a common defense to thwart Japan_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s dominance. Rewrite how the battle progresses and leave your mark on history. This game is compatible with Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies Europe 1940. Combine the two games to createthe ultimate experience of full scale global conflict !

Punched but never been played, minor crunch on box bottom. I thoroughly reviewed the contents and it is complete except the manual says 10 6-sided dice and I only had six. I added four more, but they aren_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t the same color as the six. Obviously you can play with any six-sided dice. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m an avid game collector in a smoke-free home and take good care of my games. Unless otherwise noted above, game is complete with little or no shelf wear or damaged components. High-resolution picture available upon request. Domestic US shipping is actual shipping cost for 115oz to your zip code from 30082 plus $3 for box and packaging (I will finalize after you order). International shipping will be actual price plus USD$6.00 (for the box and hassle, sorry, it is much more effort on my end). Contact me if you have any questions about shipping. Must pay me via PayPal (I will cover the fees). I have many other games up for sale and in most cases I can combine shipping for some significant savings, but please check with me and provide your zip code for details.
